flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: We discovered this beautiful Japanese tool for scoring cardboard http://www.pen-info.jp/orita.html, and it inspired us to make our own version using a bicycle gear.
guide.introduction_rendered: We discovered this beautiful Japanese tool for scoring cardboard http://www.pen-info.jp/orita.html, and it inspired us to make our own version using a bicycle gear.
guide.summary: Turn a freewheel into a cardboard scoring tool and make cardboard origami!
guide.title: Bicycle gear scoring tool
